line1.text: Emily: I found Tank on one of our adventures. We thought she was a puppy that had either been lost or abandoned.

line2.text: Emily: We loved her instantly, and it took a lot of begging to convince Mom to let us keep her.

line1.text: Emily: Tank grew tremendously within the first few months, and it took one visit to the vet for us to find out that Tank was actually a bear.

line2.text: Emily: It scared Mom a lot at first, but I guess she realized how helpful Tank was with taking care of us, especially when Dad was away. So she let us keep her.

line1.text: Tank descended down the temple steps cautiously, tracking down any sign of the kids.

line2.text: The loyal companion would stop at nothing to find them...

line3.text: ...even if it meant destroying anyone or anything in her way.
